fields.name: Please describe the issue you are having?
fields.description: With as much detail please describe your issue.

fields.name: What is the empact of this issue?
When does this need to be completed?
fields.description:
Please enter in both the date and time.
This will assist us in ensuring we can resolve your request in a timely matter.

fields.name: Have we missed something? Use this for additional notes.
fields.description:
Additional information to help your service request
Supporting screenshots can be attached using the Paperclip icon.
Suggestions on improving this form
